history.narrative: Law 6-163 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-417, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 8, 1986 and September 23, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 9, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-209 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
